ExcitationPotion.NAME: Excitation Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL your power with level increase by #b

CalmPotion.NAME: Calm Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL your power with level reduce by #b

RecallPotion.NAME: Recall Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Recall a memory belong to you
Into a combat immediately. And you will face...

RedTea.NAME: Red Tea
DESCRIPTIONS: Red Tea is helpful for sleep.

UndeadPotion.NAME: Undead Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b10 Max HP, your HP in this combat at least 1.(Can't use in Boss combat)

JyouchiReiPotion.NAME: Bound Spirit In a Jar
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b3 Bound Spirit to an enemy.
